articles.title: Schumer: Fox guilty of ‘worst lie in the history of our democracy’
articles.description: Sen. Schumer calls on Fox to stop spreading Trump’s “propaganda” about the 2020 election: “This lie is the worst lie that has been told in the history of our democracy—because it’s eroding faith in the whole enterprise."
